text: Lopo Fortunato Ferreira do Nascimento (born 10 July 1942) is an Angolan retired politician. He was the first Prime Minister of Angola from 11 November 1975 to 9 December 1978. He was Secretary-General of the Popular Movement for the Liberation of Angola (MPLA). ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Angola
title: Lopo do Nascimento
